channel.title: NPC Attacking [Project Insanity] Rep++
channel.description:
How can I make it so the NPC only attacks the player is that player attacks it? My corporal beast attacks players automatically and there's no safe zone, so I want it so the corporal beast will only attack players if they attack the corporal beast.
Thanks,
Anthony
